code: var SET_YEAR='SET-YEAR';var initialState='2019';var yearReducer=function yearReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(action.type===SET_YEAR){return action.year;console.log("SET-YEAR="+action.year);}return state;};export var setYearCreator=function setYearCreator(text){return{type:SET_YEAR,year:text};};export default yearReducer;
